page.title: 12RECREATION IN RHU.
page.content: People in the Rhu area are fond of the outdoor life and make good use of the facilities available.For many years, Rhu has been noted for its water_based activities, in particular sailing,more recently windsurfing in the Bay and to a lesser extent,canoeing with groups coming to the Blairvadach Outdoor Centre to learn these skills.Keen anglers come all year round to fish in the waters of the Gareloch.Land_based activities tend to concentrate on the fitness aspect with keep fit, dance and aerobic classes being popular. Facilities for Badminton and Squash are available within the village but tennis enthusiasts have to travel to nearby Helensburgh for public courts. With the increasing number of joggers came the formation of a local running club and for budding equestrians there is the Riding School at Shandon.
